behaviourSolutionAnalysis.title: Vulnerabilities
behaviourSolutionAnalysis.helperText: Describe any vulnerabilities you were experiencing at the time (e.g., lack of sleep, stress).
behaviourSolutionAnalysis.question: Describe the vulnerabilities.

behaviourSolutionAnalysis.title: Prompting Event
behaviourSolutionAnalysis.helperText: Describe the event that prompted the behavior.
behaviourSolutionAnalysis.question: What triggered the behavior?

behaviourSolutionAnalysis.title: Surface Emotion
behaviourSolutionAnalysis.helperText: Identify the immediate emotion you felt.
behaviourSolutionAnalysis.question: What emotion did you feel on the surface?

behaviourSolutionAnalysis.title: Underlying Emotions
behaviourSolutionAnalysis.helperText: Identify any deeper emotions underlying the surface emotion.
behaviourSolutionAnalysis.question: What underlying emotions did you feel?

behaviourSolutionAnalysis.title: Self-Talk
behaviourSolutionAnalysis.helperText: Describe any self-talk you engaged in.
behaviourSolutionAnalysis.question: What were you saying to yourself?

behaviourSolutionAnalysis.title: Physical Sensations
behaviourSolutionAnalysis.helperText: Describe any physical sensations you experienced.
behaviourSolutionAnalysis.question: What did you feel in your body?

behaviourSolutionAnalysis.title: Action Urge
behaviourSolutionAnalysis.helperText: Describe any urges to act that you felt.
behaviourSolutionAnalysis.question: What was your urge to act?

behaviourSolutionAnalysis.title: Behaviour
behaviourSolutionAnalysis.helperText: Describe the behavior you engaged in.
behaviourSolutionAnalysis.question: What behavior did you engage in?

behaviourSolutionAnalysis.title: Consequences
behaviourSolutionAnalysis.helperText: Describe the consequences of the behavior.
behaviourSolutionAnalysis.question: What were the consequences of the behavior?

behaviourSolutionAnalysis.title: Alternative Solutions
behaviourSolutionAnalysis.helperText: Think of alternative solutions for the future.
behaviourSolutionAnalysis.question: What alternative solutions can you think of for the future?

feelingsModel.title: Interpretation
feelingsModel.helperText: Describe your interpretation (judgement, evaluation, self-talk, belief).
feelingsModel.question: What was your interpretation?

feelingsModel.title: Emotion
feelingsModel.helperText: Describe the emotion (physical sensations, body language, name emotion, identify underlying emotions if possible).
feelingsModel.question: What emotion did you feel?

feelingsModel.title: Action Urge
feelingsModel.helperText: Describe your action urge (action, inaction, communication).
feelingsModel.question: What was your action urge?

feelingsModel.title: Behaviour
feelingsModel.helperText: Describe your behavior (what action or inaction you made).
feelingsModel.question: What was your behavior?

feelingsModel.title: Consequences
feelingsModel.helperText: Describe the consequences (include other emotions, thoughts, actions, inactions, and their effect on relationships and situations).
feelingsModel.question: What were the consequences?
